metadata.title: CVE-2018-18625 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana 5.3.1 has XSS via a link on the "Dashboard > All Panels > General"screen. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2018-12099.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
